text:
Football is a really emotional
product, also for me as a fan,

so having the right data
at the right time
and giving access to Bundesliga

anytime, anywhere,
that's our vision, our goal.
And therefore

we also want to provide those
additional values to our fans

and give them insights
into a match that they could not
imagine before.

We do many things with AWS,
so since 2020 it's

the official technology provider
for Bundesliga and we prolonged

also our partnership with AWS
since March this year

and as the official 
generative AI technology
provider for Bundesliga.
We build data lakes on AWS,
we host the official website

and the backend systems
for our official Bundesliga app.

Generative AI for us
is the most important topic

for the next years,
so we see a lot of opportunities

to create things
that were not possible before.
So we actually have projects

that would not be possible
without generative AI because

it simplifies things
and it helps us in

breakdown complex
situations and problems

to make our process
more efficient to cut down costs

and raise the bar of creativity
within our workforce.
The sky is not the limit anymore.

The most exciting thing
working with AWS

is working with
great people and having
a broad portfolio of services.
